A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi entertained me enough as a film\, but left me feeling empty in regards to the series. I enjoyed the technical aspects\, the action\, the editing\, and was fine with the cinematography.  That said...  Why?  I feel like there were a few scenes that were written under the influence of Poprocks and Coke\, and left me with the feeling like my favorite sports team just got knocked out of the playoffs.  Of course I'll see episode 9\, but with a much lowered bar.
